SELECT s.student_no, s.student_name, d.college, d.professional, d.grade, t1.teacher_name, c.course_name, c.course_no, c.course_password FROM t_sys_student s LEFT JOIN t_sys_take t ON s.student_no = t.student_no LEFT JOIN t_sys_course c ON t.course_no = c.course_no LEFT JOIN t_sys_teach t1 ON c.course_no = t1.course_no LEFT JOIN t_sys_dept d ON s.dept_id = d.dept_id
c.course_name = #{courseName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
